1.content: Before we get to the good part, here are the different media types for the transformations. Note, I'm not going to Categorize the transformation into different series, if you want to, be my guest.
1.title: Before picking the transformation

choices: Johnny Test as a Teenage Girl (Once of the first episodes)
April as Cat Mutant (Catwoman of Channel 6 Episode, TMNT 1987)
Apirl as Fish Mutant (Rebel without a Fin Episode, TMNT 1987)
Clover as a Lioness Anthro (Wild Style Episode, Totally Spies)
11.content: Here are some transformations from various Cartoon shows.
11.title: Cartoons

choices: They run tests on Johnny/Jenny just in case
Johnny/Jenny leaves the lab to check out her new body
111.content: Johnny's sister watched to see the effects of the formula that would make any girl beautify. They saw that in place other their brother is now their new teenage sister. For a moment they thought formula would be another failure like their other inventions and formulas in the past, but it did not have. Johnny/Jenny's new form held on.
111.title: Johnny to Jenny Test

choices: Little to no change, Jenny just thinks she's always been a girl
Jenny becomes a cool, savvy older sister
1111.content:
"Can you turn me back now? I need that drill you promised me!"

"Just be patient, Johnny." Susan placed a helmet onto Johnny's head.

"We just need to run some more tests."

"Oh joy," Dukey groaned, quickly lying down to catch a nap.

After ten minutes, Susan and Mary couldn't find anything wrong with the brain scans. He seems to be perfectly fine, no flaws in the DNA structure.

Mary went to pull off the helmet. "We're all good Jo- mmph!" Her eyes widened as Susan quickly covered her mouth.

"I can take this off now?" Johnny couldn't see from behind the helmet and cared much more about getting his body back than his sister's strange interruption.

"Not yet Johnny. Just a second." Susan quickly pulled Mary aside.

"What are you doing?"

"This is our chance to teach Johnny a lesson for all his pranks. We could keep him like this for a while!"

Mary couldn't believe her sister. "Are you nuts? He'll rat us out to mom and dad!"

Logical deduction proved this to be true and Susan reconsidered. "...He's still attached to the scanner. We could download some new memory files right into his brain."

The temptation of more science and no consequences easily pushed aside Mary's moral complaints. "We do have those prototype files too. We could just make him into..."

"A sister!" The idea was beyond tempting. No more annoying Johnny, hello helpful sister Jenny. Someone savvy and smart, who could help them seduce their amazing neighbor Gil.

The twins grinned at each other. "Give us a second Johnny, just one last test for you."

As Johnny groaned in exasperation, his sister quickly inserted a card into the machine. Within seconds, a stream of data would enter Johnny mind and mold him into someone different. The question was how drastic the change would be.
1111.title: They run tests on Johnny/Jenny just in case

choices: Follow the sisters/Dukey in the lab
11112.content:
"And that should do it! You can take the helmet off now."

Jenny removed the helmet casually, not batting an eye when her gaze turned to the reflection in one of the Twins' large glass experiment rooms. She dragged a hand through her hair, straightening any mess caused by the helmet. "And that'll help with your experiment thing?"

Mary and Susan glanced at each other. Had it worked? "Yeah, it'll really help us out."

Jenny turned back to her sisters with a warm smile. The sisters were taken aback. Johnny was a boy for mischievous grins, manipulative smirks, and dumb laughter. The look Jenny was giving them was far different from that. It was something caring and encouraging. Like she was proud of them.

"That's good to hear." She strolled over to their desk to pick up her things. "You guys work really hard at this stuff. I don't really get it, but you're doing great work here."

Mary's mouth open and shut repeatedly, failing to find any appropriate response. Susan recovered quicker. "It's, uh, nothing that amazing. Just doing what we know. You're the one who volunteered for the experiment."

Jenny's grin somehow turned brighter and her hand naturally moved to ruffle each of their heads. "Nonsense, squirt. I'm always happy to help my genius sisters."

And with that, she strolled toward the door, briefly rubbing Dukey's head on her way out, leaving behind two oddly comforted sisters.
11112.title: Jenny becomes a cool, savvy older sister

choices: She heads to her room to explore her body privately
Goes and wanders around the neighborhood
1112.content:
"Can I go now?" said Johnny/Jenny in her new feminine voice.

"Sure" answered one of his sisters, "Just make sure you are not seen by mom or dad"

"Will do!" said Johnny/Jenny as she leaves the lab with her talking dog Dukey.
1112.title: Johnny/Jenny leaves the lab to check out her ne...

choices: She successfully gets there without being seen
She is seen by her dad
She is seen by her mom
11121.content: She goes through the house sneaking to her room...
11121.title: Going to Johnny/Jenny's room

11122.content: Johnny/Jenny is successful at sneaking out of the house without mom or dad seeing her. She is curious of the reactions from everyone with being a hot teenage girl and maybe getting away with some things she could not do earlier and maybe understand girls better...

choices: Decides to live with the Ninja Turtles
Tries to live her life as normally as possible and keep her job
Goes off wandering the world or something else
112.content:
April was hopefully that her transformation would wear off after she was rescued from Shedder and his minions. But sadly after a long period of time waiting she was still in her current cat form, but thankful still has her own normal mind and free will.

The reporter is in a lost of what is going on her and wonders how to go through life as a mutant.

Donatello promises April that he will find a way to cure her, even if it takes him days, weeks, months or even years.

Until then April...
112.title: Stuck as a Cat mutant/woman

choices: Whoop finds a new home for Clover to live at
Clover can return home and her life with a cover up story
114.content:
Strangely even after everyone else that was transformed to a human/animal hybrid became normal again, Clover remained in her new Lioness Anthro form. Thankfully her mind went back to normal and is not controlled by any animal instincts.

Whoop quickly transported Clover to their secret labs to do tests to see why she has not transformed back to normal.

Clover's friends Sam and Alex waits for a long time for any answers of what happened to their friend.

After a long time, their boss came with the news that somehow the formula that Clover was injected with is a stronger one then what the other victims had and seems to developed a strong immunity to the antidote Sam created. As confirmed Clover's mind is back to normal and there is no danger of her attacking anyone randomly or by animal instinct. He promises that Whoop labs will try to find a way to cure Clover, until then...
114.title: Clover as a Lioness Anthro (Wild Style Episode,...

choices: Clover Goes Clothes Shopping (with Alex and Sam)
1143.content:
This news surprises both Sam and Alex, but are also happy their friend will not be cooped up in the lab nor has to be torn away from her family. Sam of course is still concerned about Clover being seen in her new form and how anyone would explain this.

Thankfully the boss around came up with a good clover up story that Clover was part of a voluntary test by some certain company coming up with a new way to check the looks of people with animal genes. He also says that a team at Whoop labs is already started doing tests on the formula and should be able to release a product in the near future to confirm the story.

After being released, Clover heads back home with the support of her friends, not sure how her mother will react with her new form.

When her mother came to door, all doults were put aside and she is happy her daughter is OK and told her that she got a call with a explanation on what happened to her. She is still not to happy that Clover kept this a secret from her, but still glad the test went well with no side effects.

The family also got some extra money so Clover can get new clothes to fit her new form since she is now too big for them.
1143.title: Surprising news

choices: They run into the boy Clover met before the mission in "Wild Style"
11431.content:
After hearing that she has some money from Whoop to go shopping for new clothes, she decided to take the chance since it would be a way for her to unwind with her friends after the strange mission and being stuck in her new feline form.

Before she went out, she searched the coat closet to pull out her light jacket with a hood. Although it is pretty hot outside, Clover wanted to avoid getting any unwanted attention from anyone with her strange form. Sure she usually likes to show off, but for now she did not feel like doing that.

Once Clover and her friends got to the mall, they looked around for a clothes store that hopefully will not be to judgemental of her new form or anything...
11431.title: Clothes Shopping

Everyone is puzzled on why Jasmine remains a Naga/Lamia. The blindfolded man does his best guess to explain the situation that maybe Jasmine was in the transformation for too long and maybe that is why the Fruit has little effect on Jasmine.

But to Mirage even though her plan to break up Aladdin and Jasmine failed, her hope since Jasmine is still in her current new form, her father may never accept her nor any of her people or anyone else in the world.

1153332111112.title: Someone else casts a spell on Timantha

choices: Timantha finds herself going to the mall to meet Trixie
Timmy transforms into Timantha at a different point
11533321111121.content:
The party went great. Really. Lots of presents, good music, a surprisingly sweet offer from that loser Turner. It was fine.

Yet Trixie couldn't help but feel depressed. Timantha said she would come, but she never arrived. Had she forgotten about her entirely? Did she just not care about her promise?

Even that felt exciting. No one ever "forgot" about Trixie. They used her for popularity and wealth, but they never forgot about her. Despite a sense of betrayal and sadness, being abandoned was almost exciting too. Timantha was full of surprises, from bonding over comics, to pedicures, video games and soaps... she was different from anyone Trixie had ever known. And that drive for attention and companionship, which consumed Trixie on a day-to-day business, was almost mitigated just thinking about how open and honest she had been with Timantha.

Trixie sighed as she went through her more unusual gifts. A Rubix Cube with alligator designs. A rocket-powered Chihuahua. An honest to goodness Monkey's paw. Even if it worked, what could she possibly wish for?

More time with Timantha, of course. If she and Timantha were the last people on Earth, Trixie wagered they would get along great. Anyone else, and she'd probably start getting needy and possessive.

She sighed, putting down the paw. "I wish I could meet that girly yet boyish Timantha again. Whether now or later, I just want to hang out again."

A single finger closed in the paw, unnoticed.
11533321111121.title: Trixie wishes for her friend back

choices: "I wish that Timmy Turner's thoughts would always match the clothes he wore!"
"I need you to hit Turner with that Cupid arrow!"
11533321111122.content:
Two girls relaxing and chatting happily, shopping and enjoying themselves. That's how they looked to the outside world.

Remy knew better.

He always kept an eye on that rotten Timmy Turner, waiting for him to let his guard down. Then, and only then, would vengeance be his.

And what an opportunity to fall in his lap. The fool had transformed into a girl, without either of his fairies around to protect him! He was just asking to get hurt!

He sipped his soda smugly, observing the girls gossip endlessly. How ironic. In trying to get to know his crush, Turner would soon lose track of himself!

"Juandissimo?" The fairy was disguised as a shopping bag and even now he was posing in front of a mirror, before his godchild got his attention. "It's time to enact our plan!"

"Haha! Of course, my godchild! Our plan is foolproof!" A pause. "What plan was that again?"
11533321111122.title: Remy Buxaplenty decides to mess with Timmy

115333211111221.content:
"What about that, Timantha?"

Timantha shook away the fog from her mind. For some reason, she had a really killer headache a second ago. She briefly wondered if it had something to do with this Timantha wish. Wanda wouldn't do anything too crazy to her mind, just enough to teach him a lesson. Her intentions were so much clearer than they were a second ago.

"Oh, sorry Trixie," curling her hands together girlishly. "I got distracted!"

"I was just wondering if you wanted to goof around in there!" Trixie's finger directed Timantha's attention to a costume shop. A sign hung in the door with the words "Try on as many as you'd like!"

Oh, what fun! They could take all sorts of photos and selfies in there! "Great idea!"

The two entered and began exploring the shop. The place had everything, from wizard to cowboy to space hero to cheerleader. Trixie was already considering a knight costume, among other masculine choices. Where was Timantha's attention drawn to?
115333211111221.title: Crazy costume changes

choices: Raph as a human girl (TMNT short "Pizza Friday")
11533322.content: Raphael transforming into a prom queen human?
11533322.title: Another

115333221.content:
A bundle of flowers smacked Donatello in the head. "Fix this Donnie!"

A blonde haired girl, wearing a red dress and a tiara stared down the ninja turtle. Just seconds ago she (and the orange jacket wearing boy laughing hysterically behind him) had been turtles. Any outsider would have trouble realizing this: "Raphael" looked completely human, despite holding a strange metal device.

The scientific turtle sighed in exasperation. "I can't fix it! The device creates a body that reflects you! It's already working fine."

Raph looked like he was going to strangle the turtle. "This seems fine to you?!"

Mikey looked like he was going to cry from laughing so hard. "I don't know, Raph. Bossy, needy, emotional... you could be a great prom queen!"

Ralph's attempt to fix Mikey with a glare only served to make him laugh even harder.

"Look Raph," the leader Leonardo interrupted. "You can take this form and enjoy Pizza Friday at April's school or wait outside for us to bring you some. What's it gonna be?"

Raph grinded his (her?) teeth together. Unfortunately, Leo had a point.

"Well I can't wear this. Prom isn't for months. It'll attract attention."

Donnie fiddled with the device for a moment. "This might fix that..." With another beam of light, Raph's gaudy dress became... a cheerleader outfit.

Donnie shrugged sheepishly at Raph's glare. "Apparently you're destined to be at the head of the school's social order?"

Raph restrained himself from screaming, merely blowing some hair out of his way. "Fine. Whatever. Let's just get pizza."
115333221.title: Raph as a human girl (TMNT short "Pizza Fri...

choices: It's a boy trying to flirt
1153332211.content:
This was the weirdest.

Raph was pretty adjusted to people staring at him. Most of the time, he was a giant mutant turtle. That brought attention and fear.

These looks weren't fear. It took him a moment to realize it was a new kind of look, that his cover wasn't blown. No one was screaming or trying to attack him with a baseball bat or whatever.

They admired him. Whatever it was about this form and clothes, he seemed like boy and girl alike thought he was impressive. Something about the "complex social hierarchy among human teenagers" that Donnie mentioned? Or was it just the shape of his body?

A hand slammed in front of Raph, stopping him in his tracks.
1153332211.title: Raph experiences high school popularity

choices: Raph accepts, either falling for seduction or to avoid suspicion
11533322111.content:
A muscle arm leading to a teenage boy in a letterman's jacket. Dark hair, a winning smile, chiseled jaw, abs to spare, and the confidence to make it all work.

Raph attributed this knowledge to ninja training his observation skills, rather than indulging the forbidden influence on his brain this body might have.

"Hey there. You must be new, huh? Just get on the cheerleading squad?"

Ralph's mouth opened and closed like a fish. Gotta compose myself. As far as this guy is concerned, I'm a normal, attractive high school girl..

"She" blew some hair out of her hair. "Uh, yeah. Just a few days ago. Auditioned as soon as possible."

The boy nodded approvingly. "Good pick for the team. You can certainly fill out a uniform."

Um. "Thanks?"

He grinned. "Name's Chet. Don't suppose you mind a tour around the school?"
11533322111.title: It's a boy trying to flirt

choices: She manages to find one of his brothers
115333221111.content:
"Sure." Raph's mouth moved before his brain did. "I, uh, wouldn't mind."

Chet seemed cool. Sports star and all that. What was the harm in getting to know him? Chet was Raph's kind of guy. In terms of people he liked to hang with.

"Awesome. It's a pretty rad place." Following Chet's lead, Raph soon found himself getting a grand tour. The gym, the stage, the cafeteria, and even where they kept the mascot outfit was all there. He'd usually be annoyed by all this prattling, but it was interesting seeing how these schools operated.

Still, it was kind of weird too. Chet kept brushing against "her" and it was a little suspicious after the third time. Where the heck were the others? He was starting to search for an escape route.
115333221111.title: Raph accepts

122.content:
As Link was explore the village, he goes into a house with a lone Cucco. He decides to test the Magic Powder he newly acquired on the Cucco.

To his surprise instead of the Cucco bursting into flamed or being killed by the powder, she became a human girl that looks to be around Link's age.

The former Cucco is surprised that she suddenly became human, but wants to be normal again.

Link uses the powder on her, but has no effect. The hero is unsure how to help the Cucco girl...

choices: They continue on the main quest

1221.title: Continue the quest with the Cucco girl

12212.content: So what does Link use the powder on?
12212.title: Link wants to test the Magic Powder more (other...

choices: Link trains the girl on how to use a sword
Link goes and buys a shield for the girl
They continue on the quest/explore Hyrule
1221221.content:
Even though Link does not have all 3 of the Jewels/necklaces to find the Master Sword, he decides to explore the lost woods a bit with his new travel companion.

After exploring a little bit, it seems that Link already found the Master Sword. But the hero has a gut feeling that this is not the fabled Master Sword and is most likely a fake to trick those in search for the sword.

But since he has the Magic powder he decides to try it on the sword to see what it does. So he sprinkles some on the sword and wait for anything to happen, but nothing seems to happen, but he dares not touch it.

The cucco girl tired of waiting for any changes to the sword decides to go for it and pull it out. Link tries to stop her, but he was too late as the girl begins to pull the sword out.

After a few moments, nothing happens, no traps, no curses, nothing... It seems maybe the powder did do something to the sword to make it real and disarm any traps or spells.

The girl is pretty excited that now she has a sword to protect herself on the journey to find the cure. Even though she might be human for only a short time, she might as well have fun while it lasts.
1221221.title: A Fake Master Sword

choices: Shop for a new Outfit and Sheild
12212211.content:
Since the "Cucco" girl has no experience using a sword, Link decides to train her and she if she might be able to protect herself and hold on to her own.

To Link's surprise she seems to pick up the training really quickly, pretty much as quickly as Link did after he picked up with sword and shield from his late uncle. Seems the girl is very determended to find the cure and she will not let anything stand in her way.

This pleases Link to finally have someone watch his back as he watches her back.

Now Link can have the girl follow him into any dungeons and help him get past enemies and traps.
12212211.title: Link trains the girl on how to use a sword

122122111.content:
Even though the "Cucco" girl knows how to use a sword, she has no shield to defend herself and the current outfit she has could actually hamper the journey/quest, Link curses himself of not thinking about it ahead of time.

The Shield was easy enough to get, but the outfit was a problem. None of the outfits Link and the Girl saw would be really that good for Travelling.

So they decided to make an order with a Tailor for a good travel outfit for the girl. The Tailor says he should have it done by tomorrow. The job costs Link a lot of Rupees, but hopefully it should be worth it.

Until then Link buys a room for both him and the girl for a overnight stay and thankfully there is two separate beds to avoid any awkwardness.
122122111.title: Shop for a new Outfit and Sheild

1221221111.content:
After a weird and partly adventurous day both Link and the Cucco girl Christin (which Link decided to name her) went into their bedroom to sleep in for the night.

Christin was too excited to sleep and is very much looking forward to going on this adventure with Link. At first she wanted to go back to her normal life as a Cucco, but she is given a chance to do something interesting for once in her lifetime she took the chance.

As Link tired to go to sleep with an over excited Christin, he thinks about her and is starting to like her, even though they only know each other for several hours. He has a couple of concerns about her: he worries that she might not have much of a chance to survive the adventure and the other thought is he is not sure if he would want her to become a Cucco again after the adventure, he likes the way she is right now and something is starting to stir in his heart, but he has not idea what it is.

After a while Christin finally calms down enough and falls asleep and soon Link follows...
1221221111.title: Bedtime for heroes

So the hero heads back into the Church/Santuary with the Cucco girl and tells Zelda the plan. She is unsure of it, but decides it is for the best to keep her safe.

134.content:
Three manga that also feature temporary transformations.

Osananajimi wa Onnanoko ni Naare: a teenager named Shuuichi saves a fairy, who proceeds to try and grant his wish for a childhood girlfriend by turning his best friend Iori into Shiori. He's less than amused and easily turns back by focusing on his masculinity. If the fairy can just make him more feminine and fall for Shuu...

Kedamono Damono: Every 12 hours Haruki becomes an extremely flirtatious girl. His girlfriend Konatsu isn't as put off by this as you'd think.

Clear Up After Rain: Five high schoolers turn into girls whenever it rains. The cure is to confess to their crush, but complications can easily ensue...
134.title: More Obscure Anime/Manga

choices: She gets a potion to mess with Iori's mind
She talks Iori into going on a date
1341.content:
"Become a girl!"

Iori growled angrily. Once again, that stupid fairy Syphie had snuck past his defenses and transformed him into Shiori. She pulled this almost everyday, often in his sleep. And it was all Suuichi's fault. If his supposed "best friend" hadn't wished for a childhood girlfriend, Iori wouldn't be in this mess. And yet he had and here Iori was.

Luckily, this problem was easily solved.

"I'm a guy!" With a burst of smoke, the petite form of Shiori returned to the natural teenager Iori.

"Are you ever gonna give up, Syphie? You know you can't beat me!"

Syphie stuck out a tongue. "Until I grant Shuuichi's wish, I can't say I've repaid my debt to him."

"Do you have to turn me into a girl to do it?" he grumbled in annoyance.

"I can't just create a new person! No fairy is that strong!" She had the haughty tone of someone saying "well obviously!"

"Well there has to be a way to handle this so I don't have to suffer!"

Syphie paused in consideration. Yes... There was a better way to do this. She just had to be crafty about it.
1341.title: Iori resists becoming Shiori (Osananajimi wa On...

choices: "Oh no, you date someone else tomorrow..."
13413.content:
"Alright, let's make a deal."

Iori raised an eyebrow. "A deal? Like what?"

The fairy grinned. "You go on a date. A really girly date, as Shiori. And you have to behave like a normal, sweet girl for as long as the date lasts."

A snort. "And why would I agree to that?"

"Because I won't transform you into Shiori for two weeks afterward."

Iori's apathetic smirk turned into a stunned blubbering, like a fish out of water. As soon as he recovered: "a month."

Syphie grimaced. "...Only if it's a very long date. Lunch, a movie, dinner, a long walk on the beach, the whole she-bang."

Just that description was horrifying enough for the young boy. But a whole month without being Shiori...

"And if I lose?"

"You marry Shuuichi and embrace Shiori."

"Oh shove off!"

"Fine, fine, you... have to be hit with a spell. A spell that makes the world think you've always been Shiori, for a month."

High risk, high reward. "I get to decide when the month starts and ends."

Clever boy. "Of course."

"You got a deal."

And they shook on it. Iori put his hands on his hips confidently.

"So, when do Shuuichi and I have to do this?"
13413.title: She talks Iori into going on a date

choices: His love interest Yanase, turned into a boy
134132.content:
"Wait, what?!" Eyes flashed with anger. "That wasn't the deal!"

"It wasn't NOT the deal." She grinned smugly. "Surrendering already?"

Iori grinded his teeth together. "..I'll be there."

"Great! Then I'll make the preparations." And with a quick poof, she was gone.

Iori flopped onto his bed in frustration. "What have I gotten myself into..."
---------
When Iori woke the next morning, Sylphie had transformed him in the night. Figures. Luckily, his mom was out getting groceries, so he didn't have to worry about her walking in on him.

Sylphie had conveniently left some girly clothes for him in his closet, although much more risqué than he'd prefer. He managed to turn up something conservative and practical. If he was gonna play Shiori, Shiori would have some feminine modesty. Before long, Shiori was decked out in a long skirt with a blouse that flattered her figure. Hair had been straightened and this body always seemed to have a natural amount of makeup on it. Small mercies.

She waited in the park, purse in hand, somewhat impatiently. The sooner they started, the sooner she'd be done.

"Hello Shiori. Are you ready for our date?"
134132.title: "Oh no, you date someone else tomorrow..."

choices: They go to an amusement park
1341321.content:
Oh, you've got to be kidding me.

She'd transformed herself well. She was human sized now, in a modern skirt and clothes. Her bust was overly flattering to her figure and she was beautiful enough to catch the eyes of many a man. But there was no disguising that smug look on her face.

"What the hell are you up to, Sylphie?"

The fairy covered her mouth in mock-shock. "My goodness Shiori, what language! Someone might call you a boy with talk like that!"

He'd love nothing more than to smack her upside the head. But the wager was on. So with a sigh, he got into character.

"I'm sorry Sylphie. That was very rude of me. I just wasn't expecting you for my blind date..."

Sylphie frowned. He recovered quicker than she expected. But the date was only just beginning.

"I thought you might enjoy my company, darling."

Eyes twitched. "What if people give us strange looks? We are two girls..."

The fairy wrapped an arm around the boy-turned-girl smugly. "Who would pay attention to two girlfriends hanging out together? After all, we've stuck together so long..."

So that was her game. This wasn't a first date situation. This was supposed to be two very close girls enjoying their time together.

He forced a smile onto Shiori's face. "It's good to see you, Sylphie."

"And you as well, Shiori."
1341321.title: It's Sylphie in human form

choices: He doesn't remember being a girl, per the spell
1341322.content:
Shiori couldn't believe her eyes. It couldn't be Yanase. Sure, they had the same color hair, similar facial features... He even had his hair in a ponytail! But surely Sylphie didn't have this kind of power...

"Y-Yanase?"

The man blushed considerably.
1341322.title: His love interest Yanase, turned into a boy

1343.content:
Five highschoolers that transformed, who should we focus on?

Hazuki is an easygoing kid who resents his twin brother. He's a fantastic cook and gets along with most people, but nervous and lets people tell him what to do. He becomes Tsukiko, who has become friends with a girl named Asumi and her older brother Takuma. But Takuma has gained a crush on his sister's friend...

Touma is a natural leader, calm and assertive. He has little trouble becoming Mako and his/her looks catches many eyes.
1343.title: Rain falls, girls appear (Clear Up After Rain)

13431.content:
Tsukiko felt the raindrops as a small grimace overtook her features. "More rain?" It hasn't stopped for more than a few hours throughout the week. Which meant Hazuki was still stuck as Tsukiko until twelve hours after it stopped raining.

Out of all the kids, Hazuki considered himself the most serious about this whole transformation business. Which isn't to say the others weren't concerned about the matter, of course not. But he felt it was only natural that "Tsukiko" made friends. The others had mostly kept to themselves. It just seemed clear to Hazuki to make a distinction. "Tsukiko" was friends with Asumi and Takuma. Hazuki, to them, was just Tsukiko's cousin. He was even uncomfortable answering their texts while in Tsukiko form. It just seems dishonest.

But there was no need to worry about that today. Tsukiko had finished her classes and could finally relax. Maybe she and Asumi could meet up. It was always fun to get a coffee. On the other hand, she got the feeling Asumi wanted to go shopping. Getting second hand clothes for herself was expensive enough, she wasn't sure she had enough for an excursion like that.

And there was Takuma Houjou. He was funny and cool and endlessly sweet. It'd be nice to meet up with him. Maybe he could make another batch of cookies for him.
13431.title: Hazuki/Tsukiko

13433.content:
Madoka (who doesn't change his name) is the big guy of the group. Very caring and almost motherly at times. She's especially attractive as a girl and has other girls crushing on her.

Junta is rash and careless, probably to make up for his small size. He's a fighter in both forms but finds himself embarrassed by his cuteness as Junko.
13433.title: One of the other three

choices: Meet with the other new girls
134332.content:
Junta considered himself a bit of a man's man, despite his appearance. People were always estimating him just because he was short. Even taking self-defense classes didn't seem to stop the condescending remarks. Turning into a girl had only made it worse. Just the other day, he overheard some boys call Junko "small and cute". If she wasn't trying to maintain a low profile, she might have knocked his block off.

Still, there was something... strange about being a girl. Little things and behaviors that were different than before. At first it seemed typical. The gang had discussed bras the night before, noting their expensiveness. They were new to this, so they had to discuss how to handle the article of clothing.

But there was something else too. They giggled when they joked around together. Their postures were different. When startled, they reflexively brought their hands to their chest. They were the same yet... different.

Junko stared at herself in the mirror, gauging her features as the rain tapped on the roof. She was small and cute, much as she denied it. The school uniform looked pretty good on her too. She twirled around in a circle, smiling slightly as the skirt spun. She really was kind of cute. Maybe Sakurako would like it. Not that she was the kind of girl that would like girls but... maybe.
134332.title: Junta/Junko

1343321.content:
Sakurako. A tall student with a cool, wise sir to her. She was also, in both Junta and Junko's opinion no matter what their body was, absolutely beautiful.

The beauty had heard Junko complaining about homework and had offered to help out. A repayment for Junko saving her from that perv walking around campus. The other "girls" told Junko to pass, but... how could she turn down more time with someone like Sakurako?

And so Junko arrived at the library, looking for her crush. It was just two girls hanging out, what could go wrong?

With her, Junko had brought...
1343321.title: Meet with your crush, Sakurako

choices: April as Mutant Turtle (TMNT Comic Special)
14.content:
Transformations in Comic Books/Strips

Notes:

1. Don't know the number or title of when April actually became a Turtle Mutant

2. The one with the Archie characters as their opposite genders had Sabrina the Teenage Witch and her talking cat cast the spell

3. Don't know what year Jason became a girl in a (spoiler) dream. As for the transformation, you can remain it as a dream or have it happen in real life.
14.title: Comic

choices: That she was about to run into someone
That she was doing something feminine
144.content:
Guy Gardner was a real man's man. The pinnacle of masculinity. Girls flocked to his muscled arms, or so he liked to think.

So of course, he had to be cloned in the far future. Dumped in the body of some woman, turning him into from a ladies man to just a lady. And if that wasn't enough of a kick in the nuts, the lady's brain was still rummaging around in here. She didn't know what was going on, but Guy knew that Shiryella Tome was influencing him without knowing it.

Guy had to clear her head. She couldn't let it get to her head. She was Guy Gardner, not some stubborn mother.

Distracted by her mental cleansing, Guy didn't notice...
144.title: Your Choice

choices: Guy feels a rush of solidarity against Superman's behavior
1441.content:
Not looking where she was going, Green Lantern ran straight into Wonder Woman.

"Oof- ah hell." The last person she wanted to talk to. Wondy was always trying to get her to "embrace her female spirit!" or whatever.

For her part, Wonder Woman seemed unfazed. "Worry not, Gardner. I should have been paying attention."

Guy raised an eyebrow. "Ah was 'bout to say the same thing. What's got you distracted?"

She huffed and furrowed her brow. "I was angered by that crass Superman"

Oh boy. "What'd he do this time?"

"Aside from his typical vulgarity? He tried to train me into punching more like him. Claimed I need to 'see how a man punches to get the job done'."
1441.title: Guy 3001 runs into Wonder Woman 3001

choices: Guy joins Wonder Woman on a girl's night out
Guy pulls herself together and hangs back
14412.content:
Guy could feel her blood boil with anger. That smug bastard!

"Ah hope ya showed him exactly what you can handle!"

"Indeed. I demonstrated a few blows to make my point clear and left him to recover from the pain in peace."

Guy grinned in delight. "That's what Ah like to hear. Supes need to learn that nothing can stop a determined woman. Just cause we got boobs don't mean we need a man to take care of us."

"You speak well and truly, Guy. Perhaps you would like to accompany me to enjoy our victory over drinks."
14412.title: Guy feels a rush of solidarity against Superman...

choices: Shiryalla Tome takes over her body
144121.content:
Guy shrugged good-naturedly. "Sounds like fun." She looked down on Wondy too much. The superhero had a good head on her shoulders. It'd be good to spend more time with her.

What was the worst that could happen?
---------
"You know what else Ah 'ate bout Supes?" Guy slurred, shoving her drink into Diane's shoulder.

Wonder Woman pounded a glass into the table. "His hair!"

"Yeah!" She paused, searching for the right answer in her dulled mind. "But also his thing. The thing on his chest."

Wondy nodded again triumphantly. "His hair."

"His symbol thing! Ba'man has a sign that makes sense. Flash gotta lightning thing. And I got the lantern on mah boob." The placement of the logo on her 3000 costume was pretty obvious.

"But Clarkie's got a weird line thing going on. Doesn't even look like his stupid S."

Diane's composure broke in her drunken state and began to snicker. "Clarkie..."

Guy grinned a big dumb grin. "Ah don't know how Terri can stand ta date 'im, much less come up with little nicknames."

"A woman in love is a fool's errand." Diane noted solemnly.

Another pounding of the table. "Damn right! More drinks!"

An alien creature scurried to grab the glasses of the women and find a suitable replacement drink.

"Ah tell you, if that prick makes another comment bout me or the girls" she emphasized the point with a gesture to her chest, "Ah'll punch him into the next galaxy."

"A worthy goal for a worthy woman" boomed her compatriot.
144121.title: Guy joins Wonder Woman on a girl's night out

choices: "Maybe I could do something with my face though..."
She goes to meet one of the League members
1441211.content:
I'm her drunken stupor, the words ruminated in Guy's mind. That's right, she WAS a worthy woman. She worked just as hard as any of these other doofuses.

"Yeah, that's us!" She boomed. "The worthiest women in all o' space!"

And the two laughed and shouted and brawled with aliens the rest of the night.

---------

With the morning came headaches and vomiting, but Guy shrugged it off. She was tough than some alien grog. She was a woman, proud and fierce!

Her hand paused on the switch to the future door. Something was... off, wasn't it? She felt different, like those little moments during battle when she started saying something all Girl Power PSA-ish. It always felt weird after those moments. But on the other hand, she felt really strong and empowered when she said it. It made it hard to stop.

She shook it off. She was fine. Better than fine even! Other than the hangover, she was on top of the world!
1441211.title: Guy starts to embrace womanhood

14412111.content:
Against her usual judgment, Guy maneuvered back to the mirror. She took a moment to just stare at her reflection, gauging her appearance.

She did a few experimental flexes, just to get a look for it. She couldn't help but grin in pride. Man or woman, she was as strong as a hundred men. And she made it look good too.

But something was missing now. Something to really speak to her strength.

"...Computer?" A quick beep acknowledged her. "Could Ah get some..." She hesitated at the word. "Make-up."

A opening appeared in the wall and a series of lipsticks, blush, eyeshadow, and more presented itself before her.

Guy felt an unexpected nervousness. This was a bit much, wasn't it? She was just curious, really. She didn't care about appearances or anything.

...But on the other hand, she really didn't want to chicken out. She'd be worrying about Supes or some other jackass knowing that she considered it, laughing behind her back. And she certainly want gonna let them get the better of her. What did they know? She just wanted something to bring out this newfound strength, this resolve that she could look however she damn pleased and be proud of it all the same. She was Guy Gardner, dammit. No stupid man was gonna tell a woman like her what to do.

She picked up a tube of lipstick and got to work.
14412111.title: "Maybe I could do something with my face th...

145.content:
A return to the classic Superboy story where Clark Kent becomes Claire Kent?

Or Alpha Flight member Walter Langkowski, who spent a year as a woman along with his ability to become Sasquatch?
145.title: More Comics

choices: Claire and Lana prepare for a school dance
Claire in the future, working at the Daily Planet
Supersister fights as  Superwoman in the future
1451.content:
Many years ago, a kindly couple adopted a boy who arrived from the skies. This story everyone knows.

Less known is the story of Supersister, a superheroine who arrived to pick up the slack when her brother, Superboy, went missing. Some suspected that Supersister could be connected to Claire Kent, cousin of Clark Kent. But no one suspected that Claire and Clark were one and the same, transformed by an angry alien woman.

Now, Clark has found herself adjusting to the life of Claire Kent and Supersister. Even with strange threats harming the people of Smallville and even the people of the world over, Claire can find peace within her small town.

But what kind of future awaits Claire?
1451.title: Claire Kent (Superman)

14512.content:
It had been years since the young Kent child had become the young Kent girl. By now, Clark Kent had almost completely vanished from the world and Claire Kent had taken his place. By the time she graduated from high school, she made her decision. With a future ahead of her, Claire embraced the rest of her role as Claire and left Clark behind.

She liked to think she had adapted pretty well to womanhood. She learned the little fashion choices women were supposed to know, she picked up the warning signs that a man wasn't exactly looking at her innocently, and she developed into a cute woman. Forging the documents was easier than she expected and a life skill she didn't expect her parents to have. But a lot of things were unexpected for a child of Krypton.

And so Claire Kent completed journalism school. As the strange threats to Smallville faded away and Superwoman moved to Metropolis, Claire Kent was hired on as a reporter to the Daily Planet. A job she quickly learned to enjoy.

Today, Claire Kent has put on a blue skirt, with a professional, matching jacket over her blouse. She'd styled her hair into curls and made herself look as small and mousy as possible. That was the important difference between "Claire" and "Superwoman". Superwoman was strong and beautiful, people wanted her or they wanted to be her. Claire was a nervous but sweet farm girl who somehow made her way to the big city.

Sometimes Claire wasn't sure which persona was the "real" one. Maybe it was both. Fighting criminals made her feel strong and her troubles melted away. In public, talking to people, making sure no one caught on to her double identity, all while trying to form some kind of social life... Well, it made things difficult.

But that was another problem. Today, Claire had to finish her article on Metropolis regents meeting, start preparing for her next article, and then make her usual Superwoman patrol. It was a lot for one woman, but she could handle it.

As she approached her desk, she saw a familiar face...
14512.title: Claire in the future, working at the Daily Planet

choices: "Come with me to my next interview"
145121.content:
"Morning, farm girl" waved star reporter Lois Lane. Claire waved back with a smile.

Lois had sort of taken Claire under her wing at the Daily Planet, much to Claire's appreciation. The more experienced Lois probably saw her as something of a lost kitten in the big city. And despite Claire's amazing super abilities, she found herself occasionally intimidated by the world of women. Granted, Claire played up her nervousness for the sake of her secret identity. But even heroes got anxious sometimes. And nothing was better at inducing anxiety than a workload.

"You finish your article for tomorrow's paper?"

Claire shook her head. "Just one more paragraph before I can send it to the editor..."

Lois tisked slightly. "Always looks better to the boss if you have your work ready as soon as you come in the office."

"I didn't have the time, the meeting dragged on for hours. I crashed at my computer." Claire sighed. "Do you really think Mr. White will be upset?"

"Relax farm girl. He's too busy for that. Just finish it up and send it to the editor." Lois sat down easily. "You really need to destress yourself. You're a bundle of nerves."

"I just want to do a good job..." Claire fiddle with her hair with faux-nerves.

Lois thought carefully before a grin crawled up her face.

"I'll tell you what Claire."
145121.title: Co-reporter Lois Lane

choices: "Do you think Superwoman would like these?"
145122.content:
There he was, that red-haired goof. Olson was a bit of a mess, always getting into trouble, finding himself in unusual situations, and generally tripping over himself. But he was so endearing, it was hard to begrudge him.

And today, he was carrying a bundle of roses.

Oh dear. Oh gosh. Oh my. Claire's heart began pounding furiously. They couldn't be for her. Could they? She didn't really think of herself as the kind of girl who got flowers. In fact, she strived to make herself as unnoticeable as possible, someone small and nervous around strangers. No one would suspect her to be a world famous hero.

Yet here was Jimmy Olson with flowers. For her! She didn't even know if she liked Jimmy like that. He was sweet and cute but... did she really have the time for a relationship?

"G-good morning Jimmy!" Her stomach was a pitter-patter of drums.

He beamed at her. "Hi Claire!"
145122.title: Photographer Jimmy Olson

info.brief_description: Think a character's TF experience was way too brief? This story will fix that!
info.description:
This interactive story is based on transformations that actually happened in various media like cartoons, TV shows, movies, videogames, etc.

Sadly mostly them are way too short and does not give a character enough experience in a certain Transformed body. But with this, you can write down how you think there much longer experience will go for them.

Of course I'm going to limit to only transformations that happen, none that happened in Fanart, Fanfiction or anything like that. If you want that kind of story, then make your own. There might be a chance I could do it myself someday.

Other than that have fun with this and please other Transformation that have happened that I don't know about (I recommend you tell at least a brief story leading to the transformation).


Update 5/17/15: I decide to get rid of the limit of transformations based on actually official stories. You can now do transformations based on various Fanfictions, Fanart, Fan made comics, etc. I suggest having a link leading to the original work.
